title: Physical Environment Design Strategies for Collaborative Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with digital collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Exploring collaboration optimization strategies in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of various physical environmental conditions (table configurations, group sizes) on collaborative behaviors
Learners can quantify collaborative participation patterns using multimodal learning analytics tools
Learners can propose optimal physical environment design strategies for science problem-solving collaboration

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
